Band-structure calculations were performed for experimental crystal structures of YbMnBi 2 and EuMnBi 2 using the relativistic linear muffin-tin orbital method as implemented in the PY LMTO computer code
40 . Perdew-Wang
41 parameterization of the exchange-correlation potential in the local density approximation (LDA) was used. Localized 4f states of a rare earth ion were treated as quasi-core states assuming Yb2+(f14) and Eu2+(4f7) configurations.
